QueryResult.text: SELECT P.PRID, P.PRSTART, P.PRFINISH PRFINISH FROM PRTIMEPERIOD P INNER JOIN (SELECT FROM_DATE, NUM_PERIODS, ID REQUEST_KEY FROM PRJ_BLB_SLICEREQUESTS WHERE IS_DWH_REQUEST = 1 AND REQUEST_NAME = 'DAILYRESOURCETIMECURVE') SK ON 1=1 INNER JOIN RPT_CALENDAR C ON C.START_DATE = P.PRSTART AND C.PERIOD_TYPE = 'DAILY' AND C.START_DATE BETWEEN SK.FROM_DATE AND SK.FROM_DATE + NUM_PERIODS
